Name: Skek
Review Text: I have no words for how much I love this place. Cheap drinks and awesome people, really just THE perfect bar for students. Everyone is so friendly. This place was the perfect retreat for me.

Name: Skek
Review Text: Came here after a long flight from London. Really kind servers who made me feel at home. Food is a bit pricey but very tasty :)

Name: Skek
Review Text: Nice bar. Friendly service. Unique seating options outside. Recommended!

Name: Skek
Review Text:
Just love the place !
Warm atmosphere, tasty fresh food, good prices. Very friendly staff and great music.

Name: Skek
Review Text: Great place! It is divided in two, a restaurant section and a bar section. I think the place is super cozy and the staff is sooo friendly and helpful. They are very fast and the food is great. The location is also super central and the prices are super nice! Definitely one of the places that I frequently visit!

Name: Skek
Review Text: Great place with exceptionally friendly staff. Burgers are epic, but it's also a good place to just grab a drink and enjoy the music & atmosphere. Also very suitable for vegetarians/vegans with plant-based options that are just as tasty as the non-veg ones! Very affordable given the location, suitable for both locals and tourists.
